body.p: For a detailed presentation of the WSRP protocol, read this paper presented at XML 2003: Enabling Interactive, Presentation-Oriented Content Services Through the WSRP Standard
The OASIS specification is here: WSRP 1.0 Specification (PDF)
For an overview of the architecture of WSRP4J, refer to the Architecture section on this web site.

section.p: The WSRP4J project is currently in incubator, so we are not publishing formal releases. However, you can still obtain the code from CVS. Refer to the CVS section for details.
